sections.heading: Disability, defined.Disability has the same meaning as in 42 U
sections.text: S.C. 12102, as such section existed on January 1, 2021.Disability shall not include current, illegal use of or addiction to a controlled substance as defined in section 28-401.SourceLaws 1991, LB 825, ยง 14;R.S.1943, (2012), ยง 20-313;Laws
